Title: Pilgrim Rick
Writer: Dan Fogelman (created by), Isaac Aptaker, Elizabeth Berger, Aurin Squire (story editor), Kay Oyegun (staff writer)
Actors: Milo Ventimiglia, Mandy Moore, Sterling K. Brown, Chrissy Metz
Plot: As Jack and Rebecca face a disastrous Thanksgiving, the family gather at Randall's house for the occasion.
